Html:
Hi!

PHPExcel is a great classes for easy work...

But, I have some problem...

My script open existing XLS file (by Excel 2003) with formated data as Excel5 with your Classes:

PHPExcel_IOFactory::createReader('Excel5');

...set value for any cells and save XLS file use:

PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5($objPHPExcel);

After save, formated as Superscript or Subscript text in cells get unformated:(

Use Excel2007 don't have this problem, but I need Excel5 format for destination XLS file.

Do you have any ideas?!

Rich-Text is unfortunately not implemented yet for PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5. You may vote for this issue:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=8916
